jobDescription: Joybird is looking for a Director of Data & Analytics who’s motivated by simultaneously making an impact to the customer experience and bottom line. The Joybird data & analytics team enables tactical and strategic business decisions by providing our Marketing, Operations, Supply Chain, and many other teams actionable insights to all performance data.This position will collaborate with all areas of the company, from marketing to operations, to improve the business based on customer insights. This position requires strong business and technical acumen, as well as great problem solving, communication, and mentoring and management skills.A successful candidate will have a passion for analytics, and the ability to own and conduct complete business analyses; including the end to end research, assessment, recommendation and implementation requirements for success. This role is responsible for evaluating new business opportunities big and small.
